PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-19261998-10-290,  ,  ,  TC, 
PrecisOrder fixing SATURDAY, OCTOBER 31, 1998, as the day upon which specific provisions of this Act [Bill C-15], being chapter 16 of the Statutes of Canada, 1998, shall COME INTO FORCE, as follows: . (a) the definitions "British ship" and "pleasure yacht" in section 2 of the Canada Shipping Act {as enacted by subsection 1(1)} are REPEALED, (b) the definition "passenger" in section 2 {as enacted by subsection 1(2)} is REPLACED, (c) subsection 1(3), (d) the definitions "pleasure craft", "special purpose personnel" and "special purpose ship" are ADDED TO section 2 of the Canada Shipping Act {as enacted by subsection 1(4)}, (e) sections 4 to 10, 12 to 15, 17, 18, 19, 21, 22, 23, 33 and 34. .
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1998-0111 Publication Date: 1998-11-11
Attachments
precis:
Order fixing SATURDAY, OCTOBER 31, 1998, as the day upon which specific
provisions of this Act [Bill C-15], being chapter 16 of the Statutes of
Canada, 1998, shall COME INTO FORCE, as follows:
.
 (a) the definitions "British ship" and "pleasure yacht" in section 2 of
     the Canada Shipping Act {as enacted by subsection 1(1)} are REPEALED,
 (b) the definition "passenger" in section 2 {as enacted by subsection
     1(2)} is REPLACED,
 (c) subsection 1(3),
 (d) the definitions "pleasure craft", "special purpose personnel" and
     "special purpose ship" are ADDED TO section 2 of the Canada Shipping
     Act {as enacted by subsection 1(4)},
 (e) sections 4 to 10, 12 to 15, 17, 18, 19, 21, 22, 23, 33 and 34.
.
